title: Wordle Game Clone
description: Built a custom Wordle-style word game using React.js and CSS Grid, featuring interactive gameplay, real-time feedback, and responsive design. Demonstrates my front-end skills in game logic, state handling, and UI design.

title: TicTacToe
description: Built a Tic Tac Toe game using React.js, featuring dynamic player turns, win/draw detection, and a rematch option. Demonstrates my skills in game logic, state management, and interactive UI design.
